arts.ttl: Paul Warne makes penalty claim as he reveals message to Derby County squad after Millwall draw
arts.sum: Derby head coach Warne said he felt a point might have been a fair result but said they might have had a penalty when Corey Blackett-Taylor was fouled in the box but was given offside Paul Warne admitted Derby County's draw at Millwall wasn't a "classic" but felt the Rams should have had penalty in their 1-1 draw at the Den.

arts.ttl: Millwall boss Harris clearly angry and unhappy at ‘mentality’ after 1-1 draw against Derby County
arts.sum: Millwall had chances to take the lead with Macaulay Langstaff twice going close, a first-half effort clipping off the right upright before Rams keeper Jacob Zetterstrom stuck out a right leg to deny the former Notts County striker when he had outpaced Eiran Cashin. It might look like a really good point and recovery – but we are better than that at The Den.

arts.ttl: Mihailo Ivanovic’s first goal for Millwall snatches late point against Derby
arts.sum: Jerry Yates had put County ahead in the 78th minute.

arts.ttl: Paul Warne springs major change in Derby County team to face Millwall
arts.sum: Derby: Zetterstrom, Nyambe, Nelson, Cashin, Forsyth; Goudmijn, Adams; Blackett-Taylor, Harness, Jackson; Yates With Mendez-Laing having been on international duty with Guatemala which involves travel across different timezones, head coach Warne has perhaps recognised the struggle with fatigue meaning Blackett-Taylor is given his first start of the season in the Championship.

arts.ttl: 'I had all these emotions in my head but I just knew I was going to Derby County'
arts.sum: Of course it's going to be emotional and I'm happy it was because had it not been then I might have not had such a great time if that makes sense. "The move itself was a special one because it took some time, but the beauty of football is once you're on the pitch, you just focus on the game and so I think I managed that fairly well.

arts.ttl: Ozoh close: Derby County team news and predicted XI to face Millwall
arts.sum: Derby County are back in action this weekend as they travel to face Millwall following the conclusion of… The post Ozoh close: Derby County team news and predicted XI to face Millwall appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Derby County priority made crystal clear as transfer given unanimous verdict
arts.sum: We conducted a big survey to ask fans for their thoughts about matters on and off the pitch, ranging from their verdict on what they have seen to David Clowes ' openness to investment and the club's transfer priority in January. With Derby County returning from the international break and approaching their 10th league game of the season, we have had a chance to reflect on what has been a promising start.

arts.ttl: Derby County hero opens up as he faces lifesaving surgery
arts.sum: Marco Gabbiadini has revealed how he has been forced to stop exercising as he opened up on his wait for a lifesaving heart operation. The Derby hero, who made more than 200 appearances for the club, has been waiting five months for an operation but is now set to undergo the knife next week.

arts.ttl: Former Derby County boss Wayne Rooney hit with FA ban and fine
arts.sum: Former Derby County boss Wayne Rooney has been banned from the touchline for one game and fined £5,500 after he was sent off in Plymouth's win over Blackburn Rovers. The FA said in a statement: " Wayne Rooney has been given a one-match touchline ban and £5,500 fine for misconduct at Plymouth Argyle’s EFL Championship match against Blackburn Rovers on Saturday October 5.

arts.ttl: Neil Harris issues Derby County verdict and makes 'physical' claim ahead of Millwall clash
arts.sum: Neil Harris says Millwall "know what's coming" from Derby County and admits he has spent a long time studying Paul Warne's side. “[The key battles are] all over the pitch against Derby,” Harris said.
